item.title: Self Solving Timetables with AI?
item.description: AI has potential for helping us construct timetables, but I was wondering if the AI found in computer games might actually be sufficient to do the job.

item.title: Pathfinding with GameplayKit
item.description: A brief guide to how I finally got pathfinding to work using GameplayKit for a top down game using Swift.

item.title: Calculating Student Pathways in Excel
item.description: New functions added in Excel for Microsoft 365 make it easier than ever before for timetablers to calculate the numbers of students enrolled on specific combinations of courses units / modules.

item.title: Timetable Contact Tracing
item.description: During the pandemic it was critical to identify students who had been in contact with those who had tested positive for COVID-19. This article provides some resources for performing contact tracing on timetable data from Syllabus+.

item.title: Programme Pathway Combinations with Combo Counter
item.description: A conversation about how to illustrate the impact simple changes to a curriculum offering can have on the number of possible pathways through a degree programme resulted in me writing the Combo Counter app for iOS.
